questions.question: T4 DNA ligase is similar to E. coli DNA ligase, except that ATP is a cofactor rather than NAD. Besides ligated DNA, another product is
In order to produce a DNA fragment that can be inserted into the DNA of a second organism one would need to

answers.a: find a virus that could serve as a vector for transfer of the donor DNA
answers.b: create a compatible DNA segment from an mRNA template
answers.c: cut the DNA of the donor and recipient cells with the same restriction enzyme
answers.d: be sure both donor and recipient DNA were prokaryotic or eukaryotic

questions.question: Cuts in DNA are sealed with

answers.a: cutting DNA so that there are short, single strands at each end
answers.b: cutting the DNA fragment in several places
answers.c: adding polymerase to the end of the DNA fragment
answers.d: adding ligase to the end of the DNA fragment

questions.question: The deliberate modifications of an organism's genetic information by directly changing its nucleic acid content is

answers.a: molecules that are able to covalently bond to and carry foreign DNA into cells
answers.c: molecules that protect host cells from invasion by foreign DNA
